alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; South Central Duval; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 3:33PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of St. Johns, northeastern Putnam, east central Clay and southern Duval Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 333 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from near Sawgrass to near Bostwick. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph, minor flooding due to heavy rainfall, and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Saint Augustine, Palatka, Green Cove Springs, Hastings, East Palatka, Fruit Cove, World Golf Village, Saint Augustine Beach, Marineland and Nocatee. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; South Central Duval; Western Clay; Western Putnam
